project.name: Sense4us Simulation Client
project.description: Sense4us Simulation Client: a client for displaying simulations of policy changes.

sense4us.node.name: sense4us.node
sense4us.node.description:
Upon construction of this node object an html-element "div" will be created, unless
there's already an existing element with specified id.
This class facilitates the setting and getting node data-variables.
It does not store the data-variables locally, instead it sets and gets
them from the actual html-element.

params.name: id
params.description: This integer must be a unique identifier for this created node.

classitems.description: Sets an attribute on the html-element with the specified value.
classitems.name: set

params.name: name
params.description: This parameter is converted into data-%name% before storing the attribute in the html element.

classitems.description: Retrieves the attribute value by the specified attribute name.
classitems.name: get

params.name: name
params.description: This parameter is converted into data-%name% before retrieving the attribute.

warnings.message: replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
